attributes.action: Vote to get Greece out of EU
attributes.additional_details: It is quite obvious to everyone that Greece is a failed state now and there is little hope that things will change. That country is totally subsidized by the money of taxpayers from other EU countries.House of commons must discuss the possibility of raising this question before the EU parliament and European Commission to make it clear that British taxpayers have had enough of paying for Greek debts and would like to discuss the possibility of extraditing Greece from the EU.
